website_summaries.verdict: Customers wanting a primarily goal-oriented planner will like this exceedingly thorough product.
pros: Some pages dedicated to breaking down long-term goals into short-term goals
Daily view in hourly format for ultimate time management
Daily planning pages include personal and work to-do lists
cons: Font too thin and light for some

customer_reviews.title: Planner for a Busy Life!
customer_reviews.text: Off the bat, I love the new size, I love the feeling of the planner, and of course I love the planner itself I am a die hard fan of these and have been a user for years..... Why the low rating? Well, I received mine with the corner of the cover bent. Because of how the leather is, it keeps this crease and while first world probs it's such an eyesore for me that irritates me so much every time I look at it. The leather feels nice but you better be careful...
customer_reviews.author: Riina

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what u get
customer_reviews.text: There is alot of non necessary pages making it extra heavy, look into the elephant planner
customer_reviews.author: A.bot

customer_reviews.title: Very Inspirational and Well Organized Planner!
customer_reviews.text: Loved how organized and driven this agenda is. It is perfect for people who are in need of a extra push to get things done. This is my second Passion Planer and it has been totally worth the money. I'm working on launching my own startup company and the Planner has room for writing down ideas and setting priorities, there's even specific spots to write down your short and long term goals. Very well-thought system!
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian Lojo

customer_reviews.title: Still has the freedom of bullet journals, but with the calendars provided
customer_reviews.text: I've been bullet journaling for awhile and I like it, but I am tired of having to draw out my calendar each month. I've only had my passion planner for a while, but I like that it still has lots of the freedom of bullet journaling but with the dates already drawn out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: The Passion Planner prompts mindful daily living through goal setting, energy and optimism.
customer_reviews.text: I love the accountability of the Passion Planner. The truth is right there on every page. And sometimes that reality can be our best friend. It can tell us that we really are making progress and give us that much needed boost to take it to the next level in our education, our workout or whatever or next challenge may be.
customer_reviews.author: TLC

customer_reviews.title: Great planner!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needed a planner with hourly spaces for each day and we had trouble finding one. This one is everything she needed and has plenty of space for lists and additional weekly/monthly planning. Great purchase, will buy again next year.
customer_reviews.author: ddrush

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this planner!!
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping life organized and helps refocus on personal growth goals.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: That it is really expensive so, know that it is going to work for you. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for planing out my day and it keeps me on task.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love this planner
customer_reviews.text: It's so versatile. I need to keep appointment during the week for work but the weekend I use more for to do's and important things to remember. I can make it more colorful or just plain depending on the need. I'm already planning to provide for other members of my family.
customer_reviews.author: johanna bellida

customer_reviews.title: Great planner with a huge cosmetic flaw
customer_reviews.text: Just opened my package and to my disappointment, my passion planner has an overwhelming cosmetic flaw on the back cover. Will be returning and asking for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Academic Passion Planner Pro Aug 2018 - Jul 2019 - Goal Oriented Daily Agenda, Appointment Calendar, Reflection Journal - (B5) Monday Start (Urban Blue)
feature_bullets: ✨ MORE THAN JUST A PLANNER - This tool will help you define and breakdown your short and long-term goals and incorporate them into your daily life. Create the life you've always wanted! Start chasing your passions and achieving your dreams TODAY.

✨ STAY ORGANIZED AND INCREASE PRODUCTIVITY - Manage your time effectively and learn to prioritize. Includes sections to schedule appointments and deadlines, work AND personal to-do lists to maintain a work/life balance, a place to jot down the good things that happened, a blank space for notes and doodles, and monthly check-ins to reflect on the past, present, and future.

✨ HIGH-QUALITY PRODUCT - Our LIMITED EDITION Urban Blue planner boasts a luxurious, soft faux-leather cover, hand-bound with 120gsm heavy-duty white paper, a ribbon marker, and a reinforced elastic band to keep it all together.

✨ EXCLUSIVE ACCESS - Enhance your experience. Receive access to our FREE downloadable PDFs and inserts on the Passion Planner official website. Find FULL year PDFs, finance trackers, habit trackers, and MORE!

✨ COMMUNITY EMPOWERMENT - For every planner purchased, we give one away. We’re more than a planner company—we’re a group of individuals dedicated to making a change in the world. We’ve created a #PashFam that encourages one another to graduate college, land their dream job, plan their wedding, battle depression, overcome anxiety, and achieve their dreams.
